Values.12: An elder god is awoken to end the world (`/matrix syllables`)
Values.14: Births a new being without a soul
Values.16: Certain materials can no longer harm the caster
Values.21: Changes the outcome of a past event
Values.22: Creates an inverse duplicate of the caster
Values.23: Feeds something that never stops hungering
Values.24: Food and medicine are irreparably poisoned
Values.25: Grants control over other people's fear
Values.26: Harvests people's energy for a giga-attack
Values.31: Hated enemies are turned to ash
Values.32: Heals the sick back to perfect health
Values.33: Immortality, following a three-day mystical trial
Values.35: One or more laws of physics become editable
Values.36: Our world and the afterlife blend together
Values.41: Parts bodies of water à la Moses
Values.42: Random spell from a fantasy roleplaying game
Values.43: Rejuvenates a natural area or urban center
Values.44: Removes an idea from collective consciousness
Values.46: Surreal music that forces people to dance
Values.51: The caster wastes away to fuel a grand project
Values.52: The dead are brought to life (or unlife) again
Values.53: The sun and moon become yours to command
Values.54: The user's existence is universally forgotten
Values.55: Torments the guilty with visions of their victims
Values.56: Total control over an ancient superweapon
Values.62: Turns objects into solid gold when touched
Values.63: Turns those who cross a boundary into stone
Values.64: Useful resources spill bountifully from thin air
Values.65: Wealth and power inexplicably flow your way
Values.66: Wizards take it as a combat challenge
